name: MusicStudio-makeyourownbeats
0:
”Alexa, launch music studio!”
”Alexa, open music studio and create a beat.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: music studio
des:
▶ Music Studio – Produce your own beats!
 
Get into studio and produce some fire beats. 🔥 Pick the right kick, the perfect snare and high hats and some haunting melodies and chords, to make a unique beat.

▶ You’re the producer! - How To:

1. Start the skill by saying: "Alexa, open music studio!"
2. Alexa will start playing you three random instrument loops and ask you which one you want to include in your track. You can choose by saying: “The first/second/third one!”
3. If you don’t like any of the choices, just say: “Give me another one!”
4. Repeat, with every instrument and vibe to your beat in the end.

▶ Looking for other Genres? You can extend the portfolio of your producer crib by buying one of the following Sample Packs:

- Reggaeton Loops Sample Pack
- Techno Loops Sample Pack

Don’t worry: The free version will always cover hip hop beats. We're constantly working on new loops and genres.

▶ Have Fun!

Logo Designed by upklyak / Freepik.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
